title: chunky/condensed sans serif?
content:
hello,

has anyone got any ideas what font this is? had a good look but can't find any matches.

cheers if you can help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100521113401/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_248.png) | 204.23 KB |
author: richb405

comments.content: Not sure, but I like the look of it. I've never seen this edition of "The Crow" by Ted Hughes before, but I've found that it is a recent (2006) design by Build for Faber. Some info [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100521113401/http:/www.wearebuild.com/projects/the-crow) so you might be able to ask them directly. Please let me know if you find it.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100521113401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4177Ag2AUYL_4840._SS400_.jpg)

Don't suppose you can help with this one as well. It's not helvy compressed, or compacta. Any ideas would be helpfull.

Thanks Again
Open up a new thread for a new request. That one is [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20100521113401/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100013) from H+FJ.
